attributes.action: Have more recycling bins in Ruislip High School and the local Ruislip Area.
attributes.background: Recently Climate Change had been declared as a National Emergency in the UK and we want to help to solve this problem. We want to have recycling bins in Ruislip High School as by doing this we can stop the harmful chemicals being released from rubbish in landfill sites by recycling.

rejection.details:
This would be a decision for your school and the local council and not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
